comment: Excellent teacher, in every class that I have had with her.  I have taken her theory and aural skills courses, and a few small ensemble classes; she is to the point, direct, and always helpful within reason.  Be prepared to work, and follow her instruction; you can't go wrong.  Great teacher, would take any of her classes again

As a person, I really liked her. Very cute with a soothing voice. Going into exams, I always felt like I knew what I was doing. But I never did! REALLY MEMORIZE LISTENING GUIDES, and you'll do fine. If you can't, you won't do well. I'm a composer, (amateur, of course) and I got a B in this class. I expected more, and I'm so disappointed.

I had Allyson for Music Theory and Aural Skills. There were many times, especially at the beginning where I felt like giving up because I was going to fail but she will help you and gives room for improvment! Some might not like her if you like rules, and lots of structure, but i liked her laid back attitude which helped me to enjoy her classes!
